SEARCH
Package utilities

Interface StackADT<E>

Type Parameters:
E - are the types of elements in the stack
All Known Implementing Classes:
MyStack
public interface StackADT<E>
this ADT is a last-in, first-out stack of elements (LIFO)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    clear()
    removes all elements from stack

  • Method Details

    • push

      void push(E element)
      adds element to top of stack
      Parameters:
      element - to be added
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if passed element is null

    • pop

      E pop()
      removes and returns element at top of stack
      Returns:
      element E that is to be removed

    • peek

      E peek()
      does not remove but returns elemet at top of stack
      Returns:
      element E at top

    • equals

      boolean equals(StackADT<E> that)
      compares current and other stack if equal
      Parameters:
      that - is the stack to be compared with
      Returns:
      true if both stacks have equal elements and are in the same order, false otherwise

    • iterator

      Iterator<E> iterator()
      Returns:
      an iterator over the items contained in stack

    • toArray

      Object[] toArray()
      Returns:
      an array containing all of the items in the stack

    • toArray

      E[] toArray(E[] copy)
      returns an array that has all items in stack, which is in the specified array
      Parameters:
      copy - is the array where the elements of the stack will be stored
      Returns:
      an array that has all items in stack

    • search

      int search(E obj)
      searches for element in stack that is passed in parameter
      Parameters:
      obj - is the element to search for
      Returns:
      the position of the element, 1 is the top. -1 if not found

    • contains

      boolean contains(E obj)
      checks if stack contains element passed in parameter
      Parameters:
      obj - is the element to search for
      Returns:
      true if stack contains element, false otherwise

    • size

      int size()
      Returns:
      the number of elements in the stack

    • isEmpty

      boolean isEmpty()
      Returns:
      true if stack is empty, false otherwise

    • clear

      void clear()
      removes all elements from stack
